full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` ME LHA TSE THAR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI PHYOGS MI BYUNG RGYAL DU BSANG PO BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS BRIS DGE BA THAMS CAD PHAN PAR 'GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS ME DHARMA BSHAM DU DRANG SRONG ME LHA 'KHOR BCAS LA, ,MDZE SPRU SMUG PA RA BRTAN DANG, ,MA GYOGS YON TAN DANG LDAN PA'I, ,RA SKYE GZHON GYI RTEN DU 'BUL, ,RTEN LAS MA 'DAS MA GA-YOS PAR, ,BDAG CAG @004B YON MCHOD 'KHOR BCAS KYI, ,NAD GDON BAR CHOD THAMS CAD BSANG, ,TSE DPAL LONGS SPYOD RGYAS PAR MDZOD, ,AOm SU PRA TI shTH'A BADZRA YE SVAH'A, ,BKRA SHIS 'GYUR CIG ,)
